channel.title: Do you hate it
channel.description:
do you hate it when u get this
Connection Problems Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database. This may be caused by the server being busy. Please try again later.
when u try to get on to mopar

item.title: Do you hate it
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

I know moparisthebest must be trying his very best to fix this problem so plz be co-operative and give the guy a lil break… He has too many things to do instead of listen to u guyz complain soo plz be patient and appreciate his hard work!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Do you hate it
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“parad0x_, post:4, topic:58517”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=83839.msg901294#msg901294 date=1171511548]
Me and ilya were discussing this last night… he thinks its moparisthebest.com that causes the errors (which are actually caused by too many people).

So i think we should get a non dedicated server for moparisthebest.com and keep the current one for moparisthebest.com (btw yes i have no idea about servers or internets but that what i came up with).
[/quote]
But then Mopar would be out of bandwidth in a week dumbass…[/quote]
I actually have a better idea. Check the General Site Discussion board.

Read full topic
